name: @the-node-forge/loader-kit
description: Loader-Kit is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library designed to add beautiful loading indicators to your web applications. Featuring multiple loader types—including spinners, progress bars, and dot loaders—Loader-Kit leverages vanilla JavaScript and smooth CSS animations to deliver dynamic, responsive loading states with minimal overhead. Easily configurable for size, color, and style, this library offers a simple API that integrates seamlessly into any project, enhancing user experience during asynchronous operations. Perfect for developers seeking a flexible, high-performance solution to improve perceived performance and user engagement.

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:generate && cd docs && npm run build
scripts.docs:start: npm run docs:generate && cd docs && npm start
scripts.docs:clean: rm -rf docs/build && npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:build
